# Quickstart Guide

This guide helps you get started with **LOLA OS**, an open-source Python framework for building EVM-native AI agents.

## Installation

1. **Clone the Repository**:
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/Levi-Chinecherem/lola-os
   cd lola-os
   ```

2. **Set Up PYTHONPATH**:
   ```bash
   export PYTHONPATH=$(pwd)/python:$PYTHONPATH
   ```

3. **Install Dependencies**:
   ```bash
   poetry install
   ```

4. **Run Tests**:
   ```bash
   poetry run pytest tests/ -v
   ```

## Running an Example Agent

Try the [Research Agent](examples/research_agent/README.md):
```bash
cd examples/research_agent
poetry install
poetry run python agent.py "Research AI trends"
```

Or the [Onchain Analyst](examples/onchain_analyst/README.md):
```bash
cd examples/onchain_analyst
poetry install
poetry run python agent.py "Get the floor price of Bored Ape Yacht Club"
```
